ygData.subject: RE: Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ROSHA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WELCOME! Innoruuk Bards RULE! Yes, it s bugged - fix one thing break several others - SOP! I sent in a nasty feedback - along
ygData.messageBody:
ROSHA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

WELCOME!

Innoruuk Bards RULE!

Yes, it's bugged - fix one thing break several others - SOP! I sent in a
nasty feedback - along those lines. Grrr! I think everyone else is doing
the same! Ros - read the archives here and find the response we got from GZ
(arch mage guy) to a letter we compiled about a whole bunch of bard things.
So, although we rant and rave like mad - occasionally we send in a
reasonable letter and eventually get a decent response.

See ya soon!

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 37th song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Captrosha [mailto:captrosha@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 9:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Broken Song

Greetings,
first allow me to introduce myself. I am new to this list,
but not a new bard nor a new player to Everquest. I currently have a 31st
level Bard on Innoruuk, Rosha. I have been playing him since March 26th,
just not in a hurry to level.

Anyway, with the latest patch, I have noticed a problem with
the level 31 song, the levitate one. Now when I play it, it starts, I rise,
I get the message I feel as if I am about to fall, followed by You are
already floating. This repeats for 2 cycles. Immediately after the 3rd
cycle of the song, I then fall to the ground, the icon disappears. On the
next cycle, it all repeats. It does this even if twisting, so it seems to
me that it now only allows continuos levitation for two song pulses. I did
just acquire this song, so I don't profess to be an expert, however, it did
not function like this prior to the patch. Just a word of caution using
this song now, and be on the lookout for other changes!!

Rosha Crist


[Attachments have been removed from this message]
